沙特阿拉伯麦加自助旅游,麦加 (Mecca) 是伊斯兰教的第一圣地。它座落在沙特阿拉伯西部赛拉特山区一条狭窄的山谷里,面积近30平方公里,人口约40,麦加旅游景点/门票/.

entry.tran: 麦加(沙特阿拉伯城市，伊斯兰教圣城,先知穆罕默德的诞生地，穆斯林祈祷时朝拜的方向)
entry.def: Mecca is a city in Saudi Arabia, which is the holiest city in Islam because the Prophet Mohammed was born there. All Muslims face towards Mecca when they pray.

entry.tran: 众人向往的地方;圣地;胜地
entry.def: If you describe a place as a mecca or Mecca for a particular thing or activity, you mean that many people who are interested in it go there.

example.ex: His Batley Variety Club became a mecca for high-class acts and mass audiences...
example.tran: 他的“巴特利综艺俱乐部”成了一流演员和广大观众热捧的地方。

example.ex: Thailand has become the tourist mecca of Asia.
example.tran: 泰国已经成为亚洲的旅游胜地。
